title: LimeXminer
author: LimeXminer
content: Selling crypto at marketplaces? doing Freelance? Want to receive payments from your partners and customers to a local bank account in different currencies? Want to stay 100% anonymous?Bank accounts for rent in USA, Canada, EU, UK, UAE, Asia, Japan,Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Malaysia, Turkey We can accept your mobile Payments as well (WISE, Revolut, Payoneer, Genome, PayPal) We can do WIRE,SWIFT,ACH, SEPA + CryptoWe can send invoices+ CC Merchant for Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, JCB, Diners Club, China UnionPay, debit cards + Apple pay & Google payWe also work with services like Grailed, TikTok, Etsy, Shopify, Gumroad, Heroine, Amazon, pixiv(FANBOX), Redbubble Ebay, Binance, Paxful etc.Contacts: https://t.me/bslimited or @bslimited in Telegram

comments.author: LimeXminer
comments.body: UP & Running + now we have a G2A merchant for your services (200+ payment options for your customers.)

comments.author: LimeXminer
comments.body: Quote from: grahammiranda13 on March 05, 2023, 05:08:31 PMWhat are the fees? Depends on the product you sell, turnover etc. Regular(fully legal) projects with turnover up to 5000k per month - 15% over 5000k - 10%High Risk projects with turnover up to 5000k per month - 25% over 5000k - 15%
